results.name: Continued fraction for Copeland-Erdős constant 0.235711... (concatenate primes).
link: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Copeland-Erdős Constant
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: Take[ ContinuedFraction@ FromDigits[{Flatten[ IntegerDigits[ Prime@Range@ 47]], 0}], 95] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 17 2013 *)
program: for(i=1,#c, c[i]!=c2[i] & return(Str("Terms may be wrong for n>="i-1));

(PARI) { default(realprecision, 2100); x=0.0; m=0; forprime (p=2, 4000, n=1+floor(log(p)/log(10)); x=p+x*10^n; m+=n; ); x=contfrac(x/10^m); for (n=1, 2001, write("b030168.txt", n-1, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 30 2009
xref: Cf. A033308 (decimal expansion), A072754 (numerators of convergents), A072755 (denominators of convergents).
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
